titleStmt.title: A psalm of thanksgiving, to be sung by the children of Christs-Hospital, on Monday, Tuesday, and Wednesday in Easter holy-days (according to ancient custom) at St. Mary Spittle, for their founders and benefactors, 1679.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Anne Godbid and John Playford,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Dulwich College Library.
